name: Your name must be greater than 4 character
firstName: First name must be greater than 4 character
lastName: Last name must be greater than 4 character
minPhone: Phone number must be greater than 8 character and smaller than 11 character
maxPhone: Phone number must be greater than 8 character and smaller than 11 character
message: Message must be greater than 4 character

password.min: Password must be at least 8 characters
password.lowercase: Password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter
password.uppercase: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter
password.number: Password must contain at least 1 number
password.symbol: Password must contain at least 1 special character

comment: Comment must be greater than 4 character
